text: Mary Theresa Eleanor Higgins Clark Conheeney (née Higgins; December 24, 1927 – January 31, 2020),Great Women Mystery Writers, 2nd Ed. by Elizabeth Blakesley Lindsay, page 40, 2007, Greenwood Press; known professionally as Mary Higgins Clark, was an American writer of suspense novels. Each of her 51 books was a bestseller in the United States. Her best known works were A Stranger Is Watching, A Cry in the Night and Remember Me. Clark was born in New York City. Clark died in Naples, Florida on January 31, 2020 at the age of 92.Author Mary Higgins Clark, ‘Queen of Suspense,’ dead at 92 ==References== ==Other websites== * Mary Higgins Clark at Fantastic Fiction *Modern Signed Books BlogTalkRadio Interview with Rodger Nichols about As Times Goes By June 2016 *Modern Signed Books Rodger Nichols interviews Mary Higgins Clark, May 2018 Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American novelists Category:Writers from New York City Category:Writers from New Jersey
